channel.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [RBX2][Hosted Private Cloud] - Multiple hosts migration notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Apr 1, 20:00 UTC  -  Apr 2, 05:00 UTC

Jan 13, 21:30 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer, affecting hosts in racks 31A12, 31A13, 31A14 and 31A15.

Start time : 01/04/2026 20:00 UTC
End time : 02/04/2026 05:00 UTC
Service impact : Hosts located in the specified racks will be temporarily unavailable during the maintenance for 8 hours maximum.
Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy of our infrastructure, we will migrate Hosted Private Cloud hosts in the specified racks from RBX2 datacenter to RBX7 datacenter.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [EU/CA][Managed vSphere] - vSphere maintenance notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 2, 08:00 UTC  -  Mar 5, 17:00 UTC

Jan 28, 20:26 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Managed vSphere offer.

Start time : 02/03/2026 08:00 UTC
End time : 05/03/2026 17:00 UTC
Service impact : vSphere will not be accessible and the hosts will be put into maintenance mode during the operation.
If the host has virtual machines in it, a vMotion will be performed.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on our Managed vSphere offer.
An individual communication will be done to inform customers.
Customers can reschedule the operation through the manager.

Thank you for your understanding

item.title: [EU][Public VMware Cloud Foundation] - Delivery incident notification
item.description:
Jan 28, 11:00 UTC
Update - We are currently investigating an incident affecting our Public VMware Cloud Foundation delivery offering.

Here are some supplementary details :

Start time : 26/01/2026 11:50 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : New Public VMware Cloud Foundation delivery is temporarily unavailable.
Customers Impact : Customers are temporarily unable to order new Public VMware Cloud Foundation.
Ongoing Actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident and fix it.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Jan 28, 08:42 UTC
Investigating - We are currently experiencing an event affecting our Public VMware Cloud Foundation delivery offer.

Our teams are fully committed to investigating this issue and working towards a resolution as soon as possible. As investigations are ongoing, we will share any new findings or updates with you as soon as possible.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

item.title: [BHS][Public VMware Cloud Foundation] - Management plane incident notification
item.description:
Jan 27, 14:47 UTC
Resolved - We are pleased to inform you that the incident affecting our Public VMware Cloud Foundation has been resolved.

Start time : 26/01/2026 16:49 UTC
End time : 27/01/2026 12:00 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a hardware issue.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Jan 27, 11:37 UTC
Monitoring - Service has been fully restored since 27/01/2026 11:03 UTC. Monitoring remains active to ensure long-term stability.

Here are some supplementary details :

Start time : 26/01/2026 16:49 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : The management plan is operational.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Jan 26, 22:57 UTC
Identified - We have new information regarding the incident that affected your service(s).

Please find below an update on the situation:
Update : Our technicians continue to work on the incident.
Ongoing Actions : Customers currently do not have access to their management system. Our teams are working on it. Customers will be notified when it is operational by this statuspage.
Support will contact customers who have subscribed to this offer via email.

As soon as the situation evolves or the incident is resolved, we will keep you informed.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Jan 26, 20:15 UTC
Update - We are currently investigating an incident affecting our Public VMware Cloud Foundation offering, which is causing temporary availability issue in the BHS region.

Here are some supplementary details :

Start time : 26/01/2026 16:49 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : The Management Plane service is temporarily unavailable.
Customers Impact : Customers are temporarily unable to use the management plane service for actions via the managent plane. Instances currently running continue to operate correctly.
We recommend leaving the instances in their current state.
Ongoing Actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident and fix it.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Jan 26, 20:08 UTC
Investigating - We are currently experiencing an event affecting our Public VMware Cloud Foundation offer.

Start time : 26/01/2026 16:49 UTC

Our teams are fully committed to investigating this issue and working towards a resolution as soon as possible. As investigations are ongoing, we will share any new findings or updates with you as soon as possible.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

item.title: [RBX8][VMware Private Cloud] - Cluster9680 incident notification

Here are some supplementary details :

Impacted Service(s) : Cluster9680 are temporarily unreachable.
Customers Impact : Customers cannot access their datastores.
Root Cause : This incident is caused by a hardware issue.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
